name: SnowGrow
description:
1-bit 2D endless runner building on the game jam prompt of "You are a resource".

The player must avoid obstacles while the snowball grows in size. If the snowball gets too small, you lose! 

Unfinished features:

  • Replay
  • Highscore saves
  • Dynamic progression
  • Collectibles (Buffs, Coins, etc)
